descriptionHtml:

THIS WAS MADE 4 SSE BUT NOW WORKS WITH SKYRIM.
[line]

VIDEO.
[/i][/size][size=4]
[/size][/center][center][size=4]Video Done By: Katoxivars (MYSELF)
i love to make mods but it is very time consuming, so if you could help me out
& Subscribe to my channel, i would be very[/size][size=3] [/size][b][i][color=#ff7700][size=5]thankful.[/size][/color][/i][/b]

[size=5]The Link 2 My Channel[/size][size=3] - [/size][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbcYfEB38EbvGH0cMZPAVWQ][size=5]Katoxivars Channel.[/size]

[/url]
[youtube]aUc3Th171IE[/youtube]

[size=5][i]DECRIPTION.
[/i]
[/size][size=3]I always thought that Riverwood was a bit too small and boring. So this mod basically changes the exterior of Riverwood to look & feel better than the vanilla. & too see what this mod has, watch the video above.

THIS IS A DIFFERENT MOD & LOOK TO KBR, ( Kato's Better Riverwood ) That is my other mod.
Designed a new one, cause i started to dislike the other one i made.
[/size]
[size=3][line][/size]
[size=5][i]FEATURES.[/i][/size]

[size=3]3x Campsites[/size]
[size=3]Wooden Bridge[/size]
[size=3]Many Wooden Paths[/size]
[size=3]Trees & Rocks[/size]
[size=3]Smelter Near BS[/size]
[size=3]Alchemy Station[/size]
[size=3]Enhanced Blacksmith Area[/size]
[size=3]Enhanced Trader Store[/size]
[size=3]A Bigger Food Patch[/size]
[size=3]Fishing Docks[/size]
[size=3]Chill Areas
[/size]2x Mills

[size=3][line][/size]
[i][size=5]REQUIREMENTS.[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][/i][size=3]Skyrim [/size][size=3]Up To Date.[/size]
[size=3]& A mad eye for beauty.[/size]

[size=3][line][/size]
[size=5][i]INSTALLATION.
[/i][/size]
[size=3]NMM - Simply click green button.[/size]
[size=3]or[/size]
[size=3]Manually - Copy & paste to Skyrim SE Data file[/size]

[line]
[size=5]PROGRESSION OF MOD.[/size]

[size=3]This will be updated if needed.[/size]

[size=3][line]
[/size][size=5]COMPATIBLE MODS.[/size]
[size=3]
Most AI Mods.
Most House Mods.
Any texture Mods.
only thing i know it is not compat with mods that change exterior of riverwood. 
[/size]
[line]

[size=5]CREDITS.[/size]
[size=3]( i give credit, where credit is due. )

Bethesda - for a brilliant game.
Katoxivar (Myself) - for making the mod.
[/size][size=3]Steveowashere17 - for new fence meshes.
Scarla - for new mills.

THANK YOU & ENJOY.[/size][/center]
author: Katoxivar
